document_data.caption: A map showing Westwall Street highlighted in red in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Westwall Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Westwall Street''' was a large road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Westwall Street was located in the western section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]], fully spanning the entire western boundary of the ward with the exterior wall in that portion of the city. The road originated in the north, branching south off of the [[Street of Lances]] near the [[Trolltower]] and continuing south along the exterior wall until it terminated at the junction of [[Julthoon Street]] and the [[Cliffride]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. Along its way Westwall Street connected with [[Aureenar Street]], [[Breeze's Cut]], the [[Street of Glances]], [[the Skulkway]], [[Bliss Street]], [[Ignorance Alley]], [[Grimwald's Way]], [[Satchel Alley]], [[Diamond Street]], [[Seaeye's March]], and [[Wagonslide Alley]].
